data.eml:eml: On the origin of Anagyrus callidus (Hymenoptera: Encyrtidae), a parasitoid of pink hibiscus mealybug Maconellicoccus hirsutus (Hemiptera: Pseudococcidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Triapitsyn, Serguei V., Andreason, Sharon A., Dominguez, Chrysalyn, Perring, Thomas M. (2019): On the origin of Anagyrus callidus (Hymenoptera: Encyrtidae), a parasitoid of pink hibiscus mealybug Maconellicoccus hirsutus (Hemiptera: Pseudococcidae). Zootaxa 4671 (2): 283-289, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4671.2.9
